toc.text: Incus 使用镜像加速的方法

pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h2",null,{"id":"lxdincus-分叉说明","children":"LXD/Incus 分叉说明"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"此镜像库为 linuxcontainers 的镜像，只适用于 Incus 项目。"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"曾经 LXD 是 linuxcontainers 社区维护的项目，LXC 是命令行工具，LXD 是后台守护进程。
后来 Canonical 公司接管了 LXD 项目进行开发维护，linuxcontainers 社区分叉并独立维护了 Incus 项目作为 LXC 和 LXD 的替代。
经过 LXD/Incus 项目分叉后，目前差异如下："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Incus 有自己独立的命令行工具和守护进程（incus/incusd），并且只使用 incus 命令交互，不再暴露 incusd 命令给使用者。",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"本镜像库（linuxcontainers 镜像）只能用于 Incus 项目"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["LXC/LXD 继续沿用之前体系，并且只能使用 Canonical 公司的镜像库。",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"LXC/LXD 不能使用本镜像库"}],"。如果强行让 LXC/LXD 使用本镜像库，有些镜像可能可以启动，但是会出现各种各样的兼容性问题，例如虚拟机镜像无法启动 agent，无法进行 "exec"。"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"参考来源："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://discuss.linuxcontainers.org/t/important-notice-for-lxd-users-image-server/18479","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://discuss.linuxcontainers.org/t/important-notice-for-lxd-users-image-server/18479"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://discuss.linuxcontainers.org/t/lxd-is-no-longer-part-of-the-linux-containers-project/17593","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://discuss.linuxcontainers.org/t/lxd-is-no-longer-part-of-the-linux-containers-project/17593"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"incus-使用镜像加速的方法","children":"Incus 使用镜像加速的方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"创建一个 remote 链接，指向镜像站即可，或替换掉默认的 images 链接。"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"incus remote add mirror-images {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ --protocol=simplestreams --public
incus image list mirror-images:","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: LXC Images 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
